'''Beneath Splendent Lanterns''' is an [[World Quest#Events|Event World Quest]] chapter containing requests from [[Lantern Rite Tales]] during the [[Lantern Rite]] [[Event]].

==Quests==
#[[The Illumiscreen: I]]
#[[The Illumiscreen: II]]
#[[The Illumiscreen: III]]

==Summary==
In these requests, the [[Traveler]] talks to [[Brother Qian]] in [[Liyue Harbor]] about his new game, '''the illumiscreen''', where 3 lanterns that can be rotated to produce an image on the screen. From the image, 3 locations are marked on the map with a [[chests|Precious Chest]] at each location. The same process is done for all 3 parts. The images required include a [[Glaze Lily]], [[Mora]], and a Crane.
